maqras.text: læa n thi phwk khea nan mi hying brisuththi phu ld sayta lng ta mixayu runrawkhrawdeiywkan
ni khux sing thi phwk cea thuk sayya wi sahrab wan hæng kar chara baychi
thæcring ni khux paccay yangchiph khxng rea xyang nænxn man ca mimi wan hmd sin
dangnan læa thæcring sahrab brrda phu lameid nan nænxn thang klab (khxng phwk khea) yxm lew cring «
khux nrk yahannam phwk khea ca kheapi phea him nı man dangnan man pen thi phanak thi chawcha ying
Ni (khux kar lngthosʹ xan cebsæb) dangnan phwk cea cng lim rs man (khux) na deuxd phlan læa na leuxd na hnxng (khxng chaw nrk)
læa (kar lngthosʹ) chnid xun xik yeiyng kar lngthosʹ dang klaw thi theatheiym khukhwr kan
ni khux fung chn wing kru kan pi phrxm kab phwk cea mimi kar txnrab phwk khea dxk thæcring phwk khea ca kheapi xyu nı fi nrk
phwk khea klaw wa tæwa phwk than tanghak mimi kar txnrab phwk than pheraa phwk than di teriymtaw wi sahrab rea dangnan man pen thiphak xan chawcha
phwk khea klaw wa kha tæ phracea khxng rea phu dı thi di teriym kar lngthosʹ ni wi hı kæ rea khx phraxngkh di thrng pord pheim kar lngthosʹ kæ khea pen sxng thea nı fi nrk
læa phwk khea klaw wa mi xari keid khun kæ rea thami rea cung mi hen chay xik hlay khn thi rea nab phwk khea wa xyu nı hmu phu lew thram ying
neuxng pheraa rea thux xea phwk khea pen thi yeaa yey na khan hrux sayta khxng phwk rea khladkheluxn pi cak phwk khea
thæcring nan khux khwam cring thi chaw nrk tang totheiyng kan
cng klaw theid (muhammad) thæcring chan pen tæ phu takteuxn theanan mimi phracea xun dı nxk ca kxallxhˌ phuthrng xe ka phuthrng phichit
phracea hæng chan fa thanghlay læa phændin læa sing thi xyu nı rahwang thang sxng phuthrng xanac phuthrng xphay xyang mak hlay
cng klaw theid (muhammad) ni khux khaw sakhay xan ying hıy
thi phwk than phinhlanghı kab man
chan mi khey ru ma kxn ley nı reuxng khx ngm la xik ahˌ meux phwk khea totheiyng kan
(pheraa) midi mi wa hiyyˌ kæ chan nxkcak wa chan pen pheiyng phu takteuxn xan chad cæng theanan
cng raluk thung khna thi phracea tras kæ mla xik ahˌ wa thæcring kha ca srang mnusʹy khn hnung cak din
dangnan meux kha di thahı khea mi ruprang smswn læa di pea wiyyan cak kha kheapi nı taw khea chanan phwk cea cng km lng suyu d tx khea
læw mla xik ahˌ thangmwl kdi km lng suyu d
Nxk ca kxib lis man yexhying cxnghxng læa man xyu nı hmu phu ptiseth sraththa
phraxngkh tras wa xib li s xey xari lea thi khadkhwang cea mi hı cea suyu d tx sing thi kha di srang dwy mux thang sxng khxng kha cea yexhying cxnghxng nak hrux hrux wa cea xyu nı hmu phu sungsng
man klaw wa kha phraxngkh di kwa khea phraxngkh thrng srang kha phraxngkh cak fi læa thrng srang khea cak din
phraxngkh tras wa dangnan cea cng xxk pi cak thi ni pheraa thæcring cea pen phu thuk khab li
læa thæcring kar sap chæng khxng kha cng prasb kæ cea cnkrathang wan hæng kar txbthæn
man klaw wa xo phracea khxng kha phraxngkh di pord prawing wela hı kæ kha phraxngkh cnthung wan fun khunchiph dwy theid
phraxngkh tras wa dangnan thæcring cea xyu nı hmu phu thuk prawing wela
cnkrathang thung wan hæng wela thi thuk kahnd wi læw
man klaw wa dangnan dwy phra xanac khxng phraxngkh than nænxn kha phraxngkh k ca thahı phwk khea thanghmd hlng phid
wentæ pwng baw khxng phraxngkh nı hmu phwk khea thi mi cı brisuththi theanan
phraxngkh tras wa dangnan man pen khwam cring læa kha ca klaw tæ khwam cring theanan
nænxn kha ca hı nrk nan tem pi dwy phwk cea læa cak phu thi cheuxfang cea nı hmu phwk khea thanghmd
cng klaw theid muhammad wa chan midi khx rangwal kha txbthæn cak phwk than nı kar tha hnathi ni tæ xyang dı læa chan k midi xyu nı hmu phu hlxklwng xang siththi ley
man michı xun dı nxkcak penkar takteuxn kæ pwng mnusʹy
læa nænxn cea ca ru khawkhraw khx ngxalkurxan nı raya wela xan kıl ni
khamphir ni penkar prathan lng ma ca kxallxhˌ phuthrng xanac phuthrng pricha yan
thæcring rea di prathan khamphir mayang cea dwy sacthrrm dangnan cea cng khearph phakdi tx xallxhˌ doy pen phu mi khwam brisuththicı nı sasna tx phraxngkh

Phung thrab theid ka rxi ba dahˌ doy brisuththicı nan pen khx ngxallxhˌ xngkh deiyw swn brrda phu thi yudthux xea brrda phu khumkhrxng xun ca kxallxhˌ doy klaw wa rea midi khearph phakdi phwk khea wentæ pheux thahı rea khea kıl chid tx xallxhˌ thæ cring xallxhˌ ca thrng tadsin rahwang phwk khea nı sing thi phwk khea khadyæng kan nı reuxng nan thæ cring xallxhˌ ca mi thrng china thang kæ phu klaw thec phu mi sanuk buy khun

ha kxallxhˌ thrng prasngkh ca mi phra xors nænxn phraxngkh ca thrng leuxk cak sing thi phraxngkh thrng srang ma tam thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh mha brisuththi hæng phraxngkh than phra xngkh khux xallxhˌ phuthrng xe ka phuthrng phichit

phraxngkh thrng srang chan fa thanghlay læa phændin dwy khwam cring xan chad cæng phraxngkh thrng hı klangkhun khabkeiyw kheapi nı klangwan læa thrng hı klangwan khabkeiyw kheapi nı klangkhun læa thrng hı dwng xathity læa dwng canthr pen prayochn (kæ mnusʹy) thuk sing khocr pi tam wara thi di kahnd wi phung thrab theid phraxngkh pen phuthrng xanac phuthrng xphay xyang mak

phraxngkh thrng srang phwk cea cak chiwit hnung læw cak chiwit nan thrng thahı pen khxng khukhrxng khxng man læa thrng prathan psusatw pæd taw pen khu kæ phwk cea phraxngkh thrng srang phwk cea nı khrrph khxng marda phwk cea penkar bangkeid khrang læw khrang lea xyu nı khwam mud sam chan nan khux xallxhˌ phracea khxng phwk cea phra xanac pen siththi khxng phraxngkh mimi phracea xun dı thi theiyngthæ nxkcak phraxngkh læw thami phwk cea cung phin hna pi thang xun

Hak phwk cea ptiseth sraththa dangnan thæ cring xallxhˌ nan thrng phx pheiyng cak phwk cea læa ca mi thrng piti yindi tx kar nerkhun khxng pwng baw khxng phraxngkh læa hak phwk cea ktayyu phraxngkh k ca thrng piti yindi tx phwk cea læa mimi phu bæk phara khn dı thi ca bæk phara khxng phu xun di læw yang phracea khxng phwk cea khux kark lab khxng phwk cea læa phraxngkh k ca thrng bxk lea phwk cea nı sing thi phwk cea di kratha wi thæcring phraxngkh nan pen phuthrng rxbru sing thi xyu nı thrwngxk
